article.title: New York City U.S. Export Assistance Center Contact Information
article.summary: Contact the New York City U.S. Export Assistance Center.
article.content:
​

Office Location

Ted Weiss Federal Building
290 Broadway
Suite 1312
New York, NY 10007

Staff:

Carmela Mammas, USEAC Director
Phone: 212-809-2676
Fax: 212-809-2687
Email: Carmela.Mammas@ trade.gov

Industries: Music

Dr. Anastasia Xenias, Senior International Trade Specialist
Phone: 212-809-2685
Fax: 212-809-2687
Email: Anastasia.Xenias@ trade.gov

Industries: Apparel, Diamonds and Fine Jewelry, Textile Fabrics, Textile Machinery/Eq., Transportation Serv. (other than Aviation), Travel/Tourism Services

Ashish Vaid, International Trade Specialist
Phone: 212-809-2644
Fax: 212-809-2687
Email: Ashish.Vaid@ trade.gov

Industries: Aerospace/Aviation, Automobiles and Automotive Parts, Building Products, Defense, Maritime, Security/Safety Eq.,

Brian Larkin, International Trade Specialist
Phone: 212-809-2678
Fax: 212-809-2687
Email: Brian.Larkin@ trade.gov

Industries: Media and Entertainment – Audio/Visual, Film, Publishing, Professional Services – Accounting, Advertising, Insurance, Legal

Bridgette Clark, Commercial Officer
Phone: 212-471-0060
Fax: 212-809-2687
Email: Bridgette.Clark@ trade.gov

Industries: Architectural/Construction/Engineering Services, Financial and Investment Services, Environmental Technologies, Renewable Energy

Melissa Hill, Senior International Trade Specialist
Phone: 212-471-0062
Fax: 212-809-2687
Email: Melissa.Hill@ trade.gov

Industries: Healthcare, Health and Beauty

Michael Muth, Commercial Officer
Phone: 212-809-2647
Fax: 212-809-2687
Email: Michael.Muth@ trade.gov

Industries: Information Communications and Technology, Management Consulting, Education and Training Services


U.S. Small Business Administration

Ms. Toni Corsini
NY/NJ Regional Manager
Export Solutions Group
Office of International Trade
US Small Business Administration
Phone: 212-809-2645
Email: Toni.Corsini@ trade.gov

Export-Import Bank of the United States
Tel: (212) 809-2650
Fax: (212) 809-2687

Trade Information Center

1-800-USA-TRADE (1-800-872-8723). The Trade Information Center works in conjunction with your local office. For immediate export assistance or for answers to your technical questions on exporting, call M-F 8:30​am - 6:00 pm Eastern time.​

article.seometadatadescription: Contact the New York City U.S. Export Assistance Center.
